subject: Your April automotive updates from Autobytel

            April Vol 8 Issue 4





























2009 Ford Flex











                  Chased out of the minivan game by Honda, Toyota and others, Ford regrouped at the New York Auto Show with what looks to be a modern, seven-seat crossover vehicle named Flex. 
                  
Read more>>
